subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Wildcats won in front of a horde of their blue-clad fans, with their smothering defense holding the Bearcats to 32 percent shooting.
snippet: The top-seeded Wildcats won in front of a horde of their blue-clad fans, with their smothering defense holding the Bearcats to 32 percent shooting.
